channel.title: ps3-controller on GrooveStomp
channel.description: Recent content in ps3-controller on GrooveStomp

item.title: Bluetooth on Arch
item.description: Well, today I had a “fun” little diversion. I started out by wanting to connect a game controller to my crappy little Dell Mini so I can start prototyping some games. Of course a controller isn’t required, but I like controllers and it seemed like a small little learning exercise. If you know me and my experience with computers, then you’ll know that this didn’t go as planned. Also, why would I be writing about it if it did?
